activity.note: Added letter from Middle Temple to Earl Shrewsbury. Tagged Shrewsbury, A. Wigfall Green (in note), and "Inns of Court" volume (in note).

message.subject: Shrewsbury letter
message.body: What do we do about organizations like Middle Temple? Are we creating our own entities?

activity.note: Added provisional dates. How do we tag entities when there are overlapping TEI tags?
